title: Handmaiden's Mace
content:
was designed by Lolth's assassins to fell heretics who dared turn their back on the Spider Queen. However, even the best-laid designs fall to nothingness when brought to bear against Shar's faithful.

Handmaiden's Mace Information

Weapon Enchantment +2 Set the wearer's Strength to 18. The enchantment has no effect if their Strength score is higher without it. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Concussive Smash Range: 1.5 m Mace Weight: 1.8 Value: 480

Concussive Smash

Handmaiden's Mac
